sentences.en: Boylan plays with language, letting the prose sprawl about before tightening it suddenly to great effect.
sentences.cn: 博伊兰随心所欲地驾驭着语言，先是任文章自由铺展，然后猛地收住，产生了绝好的效果。

sentences.en: Can you do this poem into prose?
sentences.cn: 你能把这首诗改写成散文 吗 ?

sentences.en: He delivered a long prose full of platitudes.
sentences.cn: 他发表了一篇充满陈词滥调的文章.

sentences.en: He discoursed for several hours on French and English prose.
sentences.cn: 他花了几个小时讲述法国和英国的散文。

sentences.en: He has a taste for purple prose.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢风格华丽的散文.

sentences.en: Her prose style is not always felicitous; she tends to repetition.
sentences.cn: 她的行文风格并非总是恰到好处，往往爱重复。

sentences.en: His prose is always lucid and compelling.
sentences.cn: 他的散文素来简洁、有力。

sentences.en: His prose is vigorous and dense, occasionally to the point of obscurity.
sentences.cn: 他的散文文笔有力、内容庞杂，有时几近晦涩。

sentences.en: His writings include poetry and prose.
sentences.cn: 他的作品包括诗和散文.

sentences.en: In rehearsing Shakespeare, I puzzle over the complexities of his verse and prose.
sentences.cn: 在排演莎士比亚的戏剧时，其中诗句和散文的复杂让我大伤脑筋。

sentences.en: Most of the play is written in verse, but some of it is in prose.
sentences.cn: 这剧本大部分是用韵文写的，不过有一些是用散文。

sentences.en: Shute's prose is stark and chillingly unsentimental.
sentences.cn: 舒特的散文刻板而冷峻。

sentences.en: The prose of his official communications was so laboured, pompous and verbose.
sentences.cn: 他笔下的公文矫揉浮华，长篇大论。

sentences.en: This is a page of well - written prose.
Thomas Carlyle , notwithstanding his tedious rhetoric, is a master of the sublime in prose style.
sentences.cn: 尽管 托马斯·卡莱尔 的语言花俏冗长,但是他仍不失为一位令人崇敬的散文文体大师.

sentences.en: What he has to say is expressed in prose of exceptional lucidity and grace.
sentences.cn: 他所要说的都以极为明晰优雅的文字表达了出来。

words.tran_cn: 平凡的，乏味的；散文体的
散文的；散文体的；单调的

trans.tran_cn: 散文，单调，平凡，枯燥无味的话，无聊的议论
trans.tran_en: language in its usual form, as opposed to poetry
